short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official SDR-GPT chrome extension. Hyper personalization on auto-pilot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SDR-GPT helps you send emails that convert in no time at all. 

It leverages AI to conduct comprehensive real-time research on your prospects from a variety of sources, providing a deep understanding of each prospect's needs and context. It then complies Battle Cards with its findings and generates hyper-personalized messages you can review, refine and send. 

Use SDR-GPT on:
- Linkedin: use SDR-GPT on profile pages on LI and Sales Navigator. Quickly research prospects and generate DMs and Connecting Request messages
- Outreach: SDR-GPT will automatically kick-in when you add prospects to selected sequences. Battle Cards and Emails are available on the prospect profile and Task View. 
- Salesloft: SDR-GPT will automatically kick-in when you add prospects to selected cadences. Battle Cards and Emails are available on the prospect profile and Task View.
